AltName.entry: OLDER PERSONS TENANCY SUPPORT - NORTH AND WEST

Desc.entry: Supports tenants and owner occupiers and those in sheltered schemes aged 55 years and over in the North and West of Sheffield. Provides help with tenancy related problems and with finding accommodation and moving into it. Also provides help with developing domestic and life skills, repairs, arranging aids and adaptations, neighbour disputes, budget and debt advice, security advice and assistance, managing behaviour and advice on using equipment safely. Funded by the Supporting People grant. Service is free of charge. Self or any referral.
